name: Free Ads Canada

description: Free Ads Canada, Free Classifieds Canada
overview:
Free Ads Canada Web 2.0 Portal offering free display ads, free advertising and free classifieds, the Free Ads Canada is seeking to make its mark in the Canadian Market after a successful launch of its Flag Ship site whynotad in the USA.

Unlike traditional Classifieds Sites, users do not have to search from within the site. Free Ads Canada portal uses Web 2.0 features and hence it has many advantages to users. Free Ads in Canada can be searched from popular search engines, such as google, msn, and in this way, giving the Free Ads and Classifieds more exposure to a wider audience.

The site is very quick, simple to use and the design is modern. The latest ad pictures are shown on the home page and users can see the new ad titles and each new category that users may create.

The portal have partnered with a Luxembourg e-commerce site, Wikio to facilitate access and distribution of the content, including its free ads, classifieds, news releases and more. Users can also add Skype name to the Free Canada Ads, which makes selling or buying products online much easier for the buyer and or seller. The site has eliminated the long registration forms, and so has made a simple but very effective end-user solution.

The Internet in 2009 is about giving the community more choice and more information. The Free Ads Canada Wiki style website allows for more choice and more freedom of information. Anyone can publish free ads, and more â€“ and all of it for free and because of its smart Web 2.0 programming, the users control the ads settings. When people search for information, its relevance is much higher in the search enginesâ€™ results.
